resources.string:
Touch on the screen anywhere and as soon as the message 'Give a command' appears, say any command you wish among 'next', 'previous', 'play', 'pause', 'forward', 'backward'. 

Just keep in mind that you will get only one second to say the command. 

next: plays the next song 

previous: plays the previous song 

play: plays the paused song 

pause: pauses the playing song 

forward: skips 10 songs in forward direction 

backward: skips 10 songs in backward direction

There is a button @ in the app as well as in the notifications. The default function of this button is to forward or rewind the song by 10 seconds. If this setting is enabled then this button will skip 10 songs.
RIGHT SWIPE A SONG TO ADD IT IN YOUR PLAYLIST AND SWIPE RIGHT IN YOUR PLAYLIST TO REMOVE IT

Karvaan Mobile v3.0

 1. Cleared out some hideous bugs.

 2. Added offline mode. Now you can save your favourite song and enjoy without any internet connection.



 Karvaan Mobile v2.0

 1. Some bugs fixed.

 2. App is completely changed but you won't see the changes as these changes are made in backend. You will feel these changes.

 3. My Playlist option added. Add your favorite songs to the playlist and play it from any of the two modes.

 4. Movie names of the songs added. Now you can search for songs of a particular movie.

 5. Seekbar changed in Manual Mode.

 6. Added a new option in Settings page to change behavior or action of a button.

 7. Added Equalizer in both modes.

 8. Added About section.
